2.name: Calamondin Citrus
2.description:
A Calamondin is a hybrid fruit think half mandarin orange and half kumquat. They are edible with a sweet peel and a sour bite. They are especially great for baked goods, jams, and cocktails. Most notably, the calamondin's year round blooming cycle offers a stunning transformation of dark green leaves, white flower petals, and bright orange fruit. Calamondins are also known for the fresh citrus aroma they give off when in bloom.
Depending on season, plants range from 18-22 inches tall and 6-8 inches wide. Plants are shipped in standard black one gallon growing pots, not in the white pot you see in the picture. Before we ship out we source the best product on the farm. Even though we can not guarantee blooms and/or fruit, we get first choice on the best for you.
We ship our trees from the farm on Monday and Wednesday mornings only. This guarantees three day shipping for each order.

3.name: 6 Big Aussie Privacy Hybrid Willow Trees
3.description:
FAST PRIVACY AND SHADE: Aussie Hybrid Willows are very popular for their fast growing and no seeds or cotton. Very attractive and easy to maintain 
GOOD FOR ENVIORNMENT: These amazing trees are great for erosion control, drying up bogs, producing Oxygen and filter the air. Great or wildlife and deer resistant 
EASY TO GROW: We send detailed instructions and tips for growing success. Links to YouTube videos too 
CZ GRAIN GUARANTEE: We guarantee all our products. If there is an issue please contact us for a fast and easy solution.

4.name: Green Dragon Dwarf Australian Bonsai Willow Tree
4.description:
Green Dragon Dwarf Australian Bonsai Willow Tree is a beautiful bonsai tree that has dropping branches with long twigs and is eye-catching for a plant enthusiast. This plant loves moist and well-drained soil. It thrives in full sun to partial shade.
Quick Growth: Fast-growing dragon willow bonsai tree with a unique look. It gives you a great focal point to your home.
A PERFECT GIFT: Get this "money" tree today and gift this to your loved ones. These plants are hundreds of dollars when mature but you can get it at a fraction of the price and grow it yourself very quickly. It's even a Perfect Gift for children to grow their own FAST GROWING Bonsai tree plant! Comes with detailed instructions for growth, shaping, and trimming. This does not require much effort to grow this little guy!
Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed: Guaranteed to grow or we will replace it! It will come as a cutting that grows very rapidly. First picture is of a mature tree. If you are not satisfied with our bonsai live indoor tree kit for any reason, contact us. We provide the best quick shipping service all over North America.

5.name: Monstera Albo Borsigiana
5.description:
Monstera Albo Borsigiana White Tiger is beautiful and unique foliage that is eye-catching for the plant enthusiast. It has cream and green variegation that is perfect for your interior decorations. It thrives in bright indirect light and well-drained soil mix.
Monstera Albo is a fast-growing plant that loves to climb on a trellis. This plant thrives in well-draining soil, with a mixture of peat moss and perlite, and they are happy in humid environments. Allow the soil to dry before watering them, and make sure there is an excellent draining hole in the pot to prevent root rot. The best way to propagate them is via cuttings.

6.name: Bonsai Willow Tree Bundle
6.description:
3 Rare Genus of Willow Bonsai Trees, Hand Selected for Size and Shape, Easy to Grow and Maintain 
A Unique Offering Indeed, Also Check out Our Bonsai Willow Bundle #2 with 3 different and Rare Thick Trunk Bonsai Specimen 
Ships Bare Root. Not Pot or Soil - Detailed Planting Instructions and Growing Tips Included in each order 
100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee - These trees can be enjoyed for years to comeHigh Quality Potting Soil like Fox Farms Ocean Forest or CZ Grain Bonsai Soil is recommended

7.name: String of Turtles
7.description:
String of Turtles, Peperomia prostrata, in 2 inch pot Super cute great plant gift, collector's succulent, live potted rooted and wrapped. These well-rooted healthy starts, shipped in their pot and soil. Plant shipped in its 2" inch pot, and ready for a size up!. Excellent as a windowsill plant or for the nooks and crannies of a rock garden where it doesn't get too cold in the winter months. Great for showing off your plants in atrium or patio, or as a part of succulent arrangements. Good as indoor home plants, just need light!. Can complement many other succulent plants in most settings.
VERY LOW MAINTENANCE!
Considered as the EASIEST plants to maintain, they mostly just need light, water, and a container to grow! Plants are shipped in their pots with soil because they are small and portable and less stressful for the tiny plants. Plants are carefully packaged to reduce possibility of damage in transit.
100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee - These trees can be enjoyed for years to come
Make sure to soak plant with water when soil is completely dry. Check soil is dry before watering again
Best tip is to stick your thumb in the soil and check for moisture. Avoid leaving out in the sun for long periods as it can get sun-burned. Keep out of frost.

8.name: 50 Horsetail Reeds

plantDetails.Plant Size: Standard: 12" to 15" tall, Premium: 16" to 30" tall
plantDetails.Sun Requirement: Bright Indirect, Full Shade, Low-light, medium, Partial Shade, Partial Sun

8.description:
These Horsetail reeds are always a head-turner with their vibrant green stems! There is nothing like a beautiful, easy-to-grow live plant in your garden or home! Horsetail is also commonly used as a live privacy fence for landscapes!
Just in case you didn't know, Horsetail is the easiest live plant to grow, this is a perennial plant so it will come back year after year. It will grow in rocks, sand, soil, moss, and water which makes it a great pond plant as well. I have literally seen it grow in between the rocks on a railroad track. Also, these indoor-outdoor plants thrive in all seasons. I mean for real, it is like the wonder plant of all plants. It has been around since pre-historic times!
We do send you guided instructions, so no matter what you will always have a healthy, beautiful plant for years to go!
We have been selling horsetail for quite some time now and we have expert advice when needed. We take pride in having the best Horsetail on the market. Each package is handled professionally, carefully, and with love. We want to ensure you have the best Horsetail from our hands to yours! Please message with any questions about sizing, care, or anything else you may need assistance with! Thanks!

Common Name(s): Tricolor, Porcelain Flower, Wax Plant, Honey Plant
Description: Remind yourself how spectacular you are by surrounding yourself with the beautiful, leafy vines of a Hoya TriColor. The indoor vines of this plant love to change color according to how much light they receive. Turning pink is this houseplant's way of showing you how well you are caring for it. The brighter the indirect light, the more pink variegation these plants may produce. Just remember to keep them away from direct sunlight.

13.name: Medium Succulent Plant
13.description:
String of Buttons (Crassula Perforata) Succulent
Crassula Perforata String of Button is a succulent shrub native to South Africa. The triangle-shaped leaves grow opposite each other and spiral around the stem, causing it to look beautifully stacked. These are hardy plants so they thrive in partial sun to partly shaded areas They are easy to propagate via stem cutting and offset.

18.name: Meiwa Kumquat Grafted Tree
18.description:
The Meiwa Kumquat Grafted Tree is a remarkable citrus tree that produces an abundance of delectable and petite kumquats. With its grafting technique, it combines the desired characteristics of the Meiwa Kumquat variety, known for its sweet and juicy fruits, with a compatible rootstock for improved growth and vigor. The tree features glossy green leaves and small fragrant white flowers that add beauty to any landscape.
The Meiwa kumquats are oval-shaped with a vibrant orange color and a thin, edible peel. They have a delightful balance of sweetness and tanginess, making them perfect for snacking, garnishing, or creating flavorful marmalades and preserves.

2 Feet Tall Grafted Meiwa Kumquat Citrus Tree in 2 Gallon Tall Citra Pot. Ship with pot and soil within 2 business days.

20.name: Mature Royal Red
20.description:
The Good Luck Plant Cactus also known as the Royal Red Euphorbia Trigona Cv. is a very different and beautiful cactus. Dark green stalks with ruby red growth covering the outer spines. This is a burgundy cultivar. In time it becomes a much branched shrub. Avoid white sap; wash well with soap and water.
Like bright filtered light and are Hardy to 20F.
You will receive a cactus from a 1 gallon pot with a well established root system. It will come "barefoot" meaning out of the soil, wrapped and packaged in a USPS Priority mail box that will arrive to you within 2-3 work days after shipped. Please convo me if you need larger quantities.

23.name: Philodendron Prince of Orange
23.description:
Shown in 4' pot.
Philodendron "Prince of Orange" is a cultivar of Philodendron sp., a tropical plant native to South America. It is known for its orange-colored leaves.
Water: allow the top inch of soil to dry out between waterings
Light: Bright, indirect light
Temperature : between 65F - 78F during the day, and around 60F at night is ideal.

24.name: Holiday Cactus
24.description:
The Holiday Cactus 'Schlumbergera bridgesii'  This cactus produces small, flat stem segments that are roundish in nature, with minor serrations on both sides. They flower from the end of these segments. The flower produces a unique, tube-shaped �double flower� appearance, with the �outer� flower being formed by shorter leaves that curl back near the flower's base, and the �inner� flower being formed further up the flower, near the stamen. They bloom from mid-November and January
If temperatures are kept steady near the 68�F (20�C) mark, flowering can continue for eight weeks or more.
Growing medium: Free-draining, humus-rich, somewhat acid growing media are used for commercial production, such as a mixture of peat or leafmould and an inert material such as grit, sharp sand or polystyrene beads. It is recommended that plants should be grown in relatively small pots; half-height pots are suitable.
Watering: They are more tolerant of drought than many house plants, but can be damaged by both under- and over-watering. Keeping the growing medium just moist throughout the year avoids either extreme.
Light: They can be damaged by exposure to more than small amounts of sunlight. Members of the Buckleyi Group, such as the old-fashioned Christmas cactus with pendant flowers, are more tolerant of high light levels than members of the Truncata Group, such as most of the modern cultivars. Too much light causes stems to take on a reddish colouration; however, very low light levels will prevent flowering. Day length is important in controlling flowering; continuous darkness for at least 12 hours is necessary to induce bud formation. A period of about 8 days with 16 hours of darkness at 16 �C (61 �F) has been shown to cause flower buds to form. Lower temperatures slow this process. The advice sometimes given to withhold water to produce flower buds has been shown to be incorrect.

27.name: 100 Blue and White Morning Glory Seeds for Planting
27.description:
Blue and White Morning Glory Seeds is a rare and beautiful vining plant that catches the eye of a plant lover with a vibrant color of blue and white flowers. It has gorgeous trumpet-shaped flowers with green leaves that attract a plant enthusiast. Morning Glory flowers are wide open in the morning and close up when the sun comes out.
It is easy to grow and easy to care for once established. It thrives in full sun to partial shades and well-drained soil. You can plant them in a beautiful pot with a trellis and place them in an area where they can get enough sunlight to thrive, and it is perfect for covering walls and fences.
Allow the soil to dry before watering them, and make sure there is an excellent draining hole in the pot to prevent root rot. Fertilizing them during their growing season will help them bloom into a healthy ones.

31.name: 2 Eastern White Pine

plantDetails.Hardiness: Cold-Hardy, zone 3, zone 4, zone 5, zone 6, zone 7, zone 8

31.description:
This plant commonly called the eastern white pine, northern white pine, white pine, Weymouth pine, and soft pine is a large pine native to eastern North America.
- Can be expected to grow in Hardiness Zones 3-8.
- Grows to a height of 50-80' and a spread of 20-40' at maturity.
- Transplants easily.
- Works well for windbreaks.
- Features long, slender, blue-green needles, sometimes reaching 5" in length, grown in bundles of 5 that are soft and flexible.
- Produces elongated brown cones that are 3-8" in length. Each is curved slightly and has smooth scales.
- Grows in an oval, pyramidal shape.
- Fast growth rate, with height increases of more than 24" per year.

33.description: The Crassula Conjuncta is a charming medium sized plant with triangular leaves. Mint green, white shaded leaves with reddish edges, do very well in bright light. Create your own terrarium or centerpiece using ever-popular succulents, or buy in bulk to use these as wedding or party favors�discounts are available for quantity purchases, just convo me for more info. Succulent plants are among the hardiest, most drought-tolerant in the world and very easy to maintain, as long as they are planted in a porous cactus/succulent soil, given proper drainage, daily bright light, and not over watered. 34.name: Colocasia
34.description: The Colocasia Black Magic is one of the darkest leaves available to date.  Enjoys full sun growing up to 36?-48? and are best grown in 70�+ soil or start indoors ahead of time on a heat mat prior to settling outdoors.  Native to tropical Asia and Polynesia and considered an evergreen perennial tuberous herb. This Aroid plant will give you lots of pleasure all summer long with its huge, velvet or glossy textured, dark green, heart-shaped leaves that are lined with darker veins. Spectacular as a sturdy backdrop for perennials in the flower border, although if you plant to set in most full sun situations, it will perform better if a soaker hose provides a little constant moisture. Excellent for water gardens when planted in a pot submerged in the pond.

35.name: Swingle Citrumelo
35.description: Swingle Citrumelo is a cross of grapefruit and trifoliate orange. Citrumelos have trifoliate leaves and look very much like grapefruit. They combine the cold hardiness of both parents are said to be more vigorous and in some cases hardier than either one. They combine the cold hardiness of both parents are said to be more vigorous than either one. Fully capable of growing in 7a and you can find mature trees at gardens in Raleigh, NC.
